const AddSnippet = () => { function handleAdd (){ console.log('add') const selection = document.getElementById("snippet-language").getAttribute("value"); const div_snippet = document.getElementById('container-snippet'); let snippet = ""; snippet = snippet.concat("
",selection,"
"); console.log(selection) div_snippet.insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend",snippet) } return( <>
) } export default AddSnippet;
